content: my little alien materials 1 50 gram skein of worsted weight yarn g 4 0 mm hook polyfill or wool for stuffing white and black craft felt small bit of embroidery thread or yarn for mouth tapestry needle scissors hello my name is eep and i was the first of my species to visit your lovely planet i would love to see more of my kind here but i need your help we can only exist if you wiggle your hooks and yarn just right we promise we re not trying to take over your world we re a friendly kind of folk and merely want to be friends directions body using the magic_ring method create a ring of 6 single_crochet single_crochet pull tight 2 single_crochet in each stitch around 12 sts 2 single_crochet in each stitch around 24 sts *1 single_crochet then 2 single_crochet in the next stitch* around 36 sts single_crochet in each stitch around for the next 9 rounds *1 single_crochet then single_crochet 2 together decrease * around 24 sts using felt cut three white circles and three smaller black circles place eyes in appropriate place use a bit of lip colored yarn and stitch a mouth pattern decrease around 12 sts insert stuffing decrease around 6 sts decrease around 3 sts cut yarn and weave in ends making sure to stitch closed any holes legs make 3 using the magic_ring method create a ring of 4 single_crochet single_crochet pull tight 2 single_crochet in each stitch around 8 sts single_crochet in each stitch around for the next 7 rounds for the next round single_crochet in the first 4 stitches and slip_stitch in stitch 5 stitches this helps make the legs angled cut yarn leaving a long tail for stitching the legs to the body insert stuffing & stitch legs to bottom making sure the slipped stitch sections are near the bottom center of the body have fun on your interplanetary travels pattern written by cassie ogle 2007
